casebody.data:
BOWDEN v. FARGO. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fifth Department. April 13, 1893.) Action by Henry J. Bowden against James O. Fargo, as president of the Merchants’ Dispatch Transportation Company..

Argued before DWIGHT, P. J., and LEWIS, MACOMBER, and HAIGHT, JJ.

*891A. II. Harris, for appellant. E. L. Adams, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment of the county court of Monroe county, appealed from, (22 N. Y. Supp. 889,) affirmed.

DWIGHT, P. J., not voting.
